climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 💕[Premium Material] Mattitude kitchen mat is manufactured from superior material that is eco-friendly to your family.Strong durable material withstand the test of time and help keep their shape,even with extended and heavy use.

💕[Comfortable] The 0.40-inches anti-fatigue kitchen mats are ergonomically engineered to provide a perfect blend of soft texture and firm support .Standing on it feels like walking on a firm but soft cloud.

💕[Classic & Versatile] The 2-pack rugs for kitchen are measured as 17.3 x 47 inches and 17.3 x 29 inches in dimension.The pattern and color compliment kitchen nicely and make the foam mats perfect for home or commercial use.
💕[Stay in Place] The non skid kitchen mats and rugs are designed with non-slip backing helpful to keep the rug sturdy and prevent shifting or slipping,thus enhancing safety.
💕[WARNING!!] Open rug fully and place on even, flat, dry floor. Water under rug may result in slippage. Rug must be placed on dry surface during use.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Quality kitchen room is essential to the overall happiness,and no one likes a bad cooking experience. Features of Mattitude well-cushioned kitchen mat： Extra thick, ergonomic and comfortable mat.No curled edges and very secure non-slip bottom.Waterproof, oil resistant, and easy to clean. Start with the best kitchen mat you can！

Mattitude kitchen mat help make the space function super well for the ways in which we live. Note:Product's color is the black and grey shown in the advertisement though may look different in natural or artificial lighting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the kitchen!
reviews.reviewText: These are nice and squishy on your feet! And I was surprised to see they are a plastic material, that looks like a real rug. Which is easy to clean!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mattitude Kitchen mats (2 pcs)
reviews.reviewText: These mats are fantastic. Easy to clean, spongy soft. Hope they last but I will order another set for the wash room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smaller than what the picture shows
reviews.reviewText: I was a little disappointed that width of these weren't longer. The feel of them are good and does help, but I hate when they use photos that make them seem larger than they really are.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks nice, feels great!
reviews.reviewText: This is our 3rd set of these anti-fatigue kitchen rugs. Not because they wear out, but because we've given them as gifts to relatives, who've also had nothing but good things to say about the way they look, feel, and wipe off easily.Try them - you won't be disappointed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Not a big fan. It is comfortable but maybe it’s just me but I prefer mats that absorb the water if I drop any. This one obviously doesn’t absorb. Makes it easy to clean but not really what I needed. Also I found it to be small for kitchen. Worth the try!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great for small places. Easy to clean and gives support

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pet claws can take chunks out
reviews.reviewText: These are a little more brown than in the picture and my dog's nails have already taken little chunks out of them. Other than that they look great and feel wonderful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Mattitude Kitchen Mat - Practical Duo with Room for Comfort Improvement
reviews.reviewText: The Mattitude Kitchen Mat set, comprising two anti-fatigue rugs, has proven to be a practical addition to my kitchen space, offering functionality and durability. While the mats excel in various aspects, I have deducted one star for comfort considerations.Pros:Cushioned Anti-Fatigue Design: The mats boast an anti-fatigue design that provides relief during prolonged standing in the kitchen. The cushioning is effective in reducing discomfort and fatigue, making them suitable for extended cooking sessions.Non-Skid and Waterproof: The non-skid feature ensures that the mats stay securely in place, even in high-traffic areas. Additionally, the waterproof nature of the mats makes them easy to clean and resistant to spills, enhancing their practicality in a kitchen setting.Duo Set: The inclusion of two mats in the set is a thoughtful touch. It allows for versatile placement, enabling coverage in multiple areas of the kitchen or creating a larger cushioned surface for more extensive workspaces.Sturdy Construction: The mats exhibit sturdy construction, with durable materials that withstand daily wear and tear. The edges are reinforced, contributing to the overall longevity of the mats.Easy to Clean: Cleaning the mats is a straightforward process. They can be easily wiped down or spot cleaned, maintaining a hygienic kitchen environment.Cons:Comfort Considerations: While the mats offer anti-fatigue features, the level of comfort could be further improved. Prolonged use may still result in some discomfort, especially for those who prioritize maximum cushioning.Suggestions for Improvement:Enhance Cushioning: Improving the cushioning to provide a more comfortable and plush feel underfoot would elevate the overall user experience, especially during extended periods of use.Conclusion:The Mattitude Kitchen Mat set stands out for its practical features, including anti-fatigue design, non-skid and waterproof properties, a duo set for versatile use, sturdy construction, and easy maintenance. Despite the deduction for comfort considerations, these mats remain a valuable addition to any kitchen space.For individuals seeking durable and functional kitchen mats with anti-fatigue benefits, the Mattitude Kitchen Mat set is a reliable choice. Its 4-star rating reflects my satisfaction with its overall performance, with room for improvement in comfort.

reviews.reviewTitle: Very nice mat; soft and thick enough to provide foot comfort
reviews.reviewText: Really like these mats. Since I hate hardwood these mats are good for helping to cover up the hardwood. Lightweight and easy to clean. Make my apartment more cozy, especially during the colder months.
Me gustó que se adhiere al piso para evitar caídas y resbalones. Buena calidad.
Me gusto pero esperaba mas grueso
Very nice product. Nice on feet. Highly recommend.
Like the softness of them and they fit perfectly in my kitchen
